s.text: Duke, Connecticut, Michigan State, and Ohio State reached the NCAA basketball tournament's final four . Duke is the clear favorite to win it all, having won 31 straight games.
The in-between spin: Canceling the visit offered both sides a graceful way to avoid a face-to-face fight over Kosovo.
The Cinderella teams--Gonzaga, Southwest Missouri State, and Miami of Ohio--were wiped out in the last two rounds, leaving no true underdogs.

She also says 1) Independent Counsel Kenneth Starr was just doing his job; 2) she felt maternal sympathy for Lewinsky; and 3) the grand jurors were suspicious of Linda Tripp and annoyed by her "self-righteousness."

Jackson's spin: He can do more good by pressuring Wall Street to invest in poor communities.

Russian Prime Minister Yevgeny Primakov canceled his visit to the United States . En route to meet with President Clinton and leaders of the International Monetary Fund, Primakov turned his plane around and went back to Moscow because NATO decided to bomb Yugoslavia, despite Russia's vigorous opposition.
Kevorkian, acting as his own attorney, is arguing that it was a mercy killing.
2) His absence helps Vice President Al Gore by clearing the field.
